content: I mentioned this on the call last week, but my colleague Jan Overgoor just published a blog post about it today: he’s been analyzing the data we’ve gathered from various providers’ SMART Scheduling Links API (and other APIs where this one isn’t implemented) over time to do some real interesting analysis of appointment availability. https://medium.com/u-s-digital-response/what-vaccine-appointment-data-tells-us-three-major-takeaways-from-covid-19-cb6adcaa8acf

He also worked up more detailed and technical analyses for various regions and topics, which you can find alongside all the source code needed to reproduce them here: https://github.com/usdigitalresponse/appointment-data-insights
